name: canvases.access.delete
desc: Remove access to a canvas for specified entities

channel_ids.desc: List of channels you wish to update access for.

user_ids.desc: List of users you wish to update access for.

errors.canvas_not_found: The canvas you wish to revoke permissions for is not available.
errors.restricted_action: User does not have permission to perform this action.
errors.canvas_disabled_user_team: Canvas is disabled on user's team.
errors.invalid_parameters: One of user_ids and channel_ids must be defined.
errors.channel_not_found: A channel could not be found.
errors.user_not_found: A user could not be found.
